attributes.review: This is honestly the worst app I installed. The minute I downloaded my phone started glitching and now bc of this disgusting phone app that is a disgrace to our technology, I have to buy a new phone so yeah thank u president orange face 😡😡😡😡😡

attributes.review: Worst app ever lots of bugs and it’s just not worth downloading takes up to much space, takes all your information and blackmails you to register to vote for him👁👄👁 smh not a good app not recommended 😿🏃‍♀️💁‍♀️😔💀❤️😭😾🙀

attributes.review: i am turning 18 and was so excited to vote so i downloaded this app with intentions to learn about this man. as soon as i opened it my eyes began to sting. i went to the doctors and guess what? i was diagnosed with terminal ocular herpes💀 at the ripe age of 18 my fate was decided by this cruel man and his sinister app!! this app ruined my life and i will never recover. please do yourself a a favor and do not risk terminal ocular herpes at the hands of this old republican man and an app that is proven to spread this serious illness!!

This made a virus on my phone and I was really sad Because I wanted to support our one of a kind orange 🥺 all the old ppl that use this app I’m going to call the nursing home if u don’t give them ur phone go play chess Suzan
attributes.title: Horrible 🤏🏻🤢🤢
